overview:
Larry Rychlak oversees the operations for the Rand Worldwide group of companies including the Services, Finance, Legal, Human Resources and Information Technology groups.

With over 30 years of financial and management experience, Larry brings a track record of improving operating efficiencies, maximizing financial performance, strengthening companyâ€™s financial position and streamlining operations. His background includes several senior management positions in both private and publicly-held organizations, business consulting experience, and as a Senior Manager with an international accounting and consulting firm.

Prior to the merger of Avatech Solutions and IMAGINiT Technologies, Larry was with Avatech for five years, where he was the President and Chief Financial Officer. Before joining Avatech, Larry was with Environmental Elements Corp., where he held the positions of interim President and Chief Financial Officer.
